name: Dave Petersen
statement:
**Legal/Judicial Experience**  
Municipal Court Judge, City of Pasco; Judge Pro Tem, Benton and Franklin County Superior and District Courts; Owner, Petersen Law Office; Former partner, Cowan, Moore, Stam, Luke, Petersen & Carrier; Former partner, Roach Law Offices; Former Deputy Prosecutor, Franklin County.  
  
**Other Professional Experience**  
Former tank mechanic/aviation support, U.S. Army and National Guard.  
  
**Education**  
Juris Doctorate, Thurgood Marshall School of Law; BA Business Administration, University of Washington.  
  
**Community Service**  
Board member, Benton Franklin Legal Aid Society; Volunteer coach, Tri-City Prep Mock Trial Team; Volunteer, Local National Adoption Day; Committee member, United Methodist Church; Former Guardian ad Litem; Former instructor, Reserve Law Enforcement Academy.  
  
**Statement**  
_Integrity. Fairness. Experience._  
  
It is my firm belief that as your next Benton Franklin County Superior Court Judge, I am a steward of your Constitutional Rights. While holding offenders accountable for their crimes, I will ensure that dignity and respect are fundamental principles employed by the court. Regardless of the matters before me, I will bring integrity, fairness, and impartiality to the bench.  
  
I am the only candidate with vast experience as a municipal court judge and judge pro tem, in addition to 20+ years of experience in civil, criminal and family law matters, and over ten years of experience as a family law mediator. My extensive experience and rational temperament makes me the most qualified candidate for your next Superior Court Judge.  
  
Born in Kennewick, I have called this community “home” my entire life, only moving away to serve in the U.S. Army and to attend school. My wife and I are life long residents of this community, raising our three daughters in the Tri-Cities. I would be honored to serve as your next Superior Court Judge. I will work hard to earn your support and trust.  I will work even harder to maintain it.
